sentence.Network_en: Syrup of Tolu is used as a vehicle for expectorant mixtures.

list.abs: 其中,香荚兰醛得自香荚兰(Vanilla)、安息香(Benzoin)、妥路香胶(Tolu Balsam)及秘鲁香胶(Peru Balsam);茴香醛得自洋茴香(Anise);苯甲醛则自Amygdalin水解得.
...收藏查看吐鲁香膏tolu balsam由植物吐鲁香膏树(Myroxylon balsamum L.Harms.)树干中渗出的液体。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: named after Santiago de Tolú in Colombia, from where it was exported

means.word_mean: 2. aromatic yellowish brown balsam from the tolu balsam tree used especially in cough syrups
